title: Textured Whimsy
description: Un style d'illustration charmant qui imite les médias secs traditionnels comme les crayons de couleur, les crayons de cire et la gouache sur du papier rugueux. Il présente des perspectives naïves, des formes organiques et une texture granuleuse très tactile qui évoque une atmosphère chaleureuse de livre de contes.
prompt: A high-quality, hand-drawn style illustration of {{subject}} rendered with a charming, naive aesthetic reminiscent of contemporary children's books and editorial art. The artistic technique mimics a blend of dry gouache, wax crayons, and colored pencils applied vigorously to heavy-grain paper, resulting in a rich, tactile surface full of scratchy strokes, stippling, and visible paper texture. The forms are organic and slightly flattened, rejecting strict realism in favor of a playful, whimsical interpretation of the {{subject}}. The color palette utilizes a dominant wash of {{primary_color}} to establish the mood, with vibrant details highlighted in {{accent_color}} to create visual interest and contrast. The lighting is soft, diffuse, and illustrative, avoiding harsh photorealistic shadows to maintain a flat, graphical look. The edges of the subject are rough and imperfect, characteristic of manual drawing tools. The image is set against a solid {{background_color}} background, ensuring high contrast for the textured edges and easy separation of the subject from the negative space. The atmosphere is warm, creative, and inviting, capturing a sense of handcrafted authenticity.
background_prompt: A detailed background scene depicting a cozy, creative environment or textured pattern without any central subject. The style mimics dry gouache and colored pencil on grainy paper, featuring elements like pinned art prints, potted plants, or abstract organic shapes. The colors are warm and earthy, utilizing shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to create a cluttered but harmonious backdrop. The texture is heavy and scratchy, with visible stroke marks and a matte finish, all composed on a {{background_color}} canvas to frame the scene.
description_en: A charming illustration style that mimics traditional dry media like colored pencils, wax crayons, and gouache on rough paper. It features naive perspectives, organic shapes, and a highly tactile, grainy texture that evokes a cozy, storybook atmosphere.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration charmant qui imite les médias secs traditionnels comme les crayons de couleur, les crayons de cire et la gouache sur du papier rugueux. Il présente des perspectives naïves, des formes organiques et une texture granuleuse très tactile qui évoque une atmosphère chaleureuse de livre de contes.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Ce style combine des illustrations de type gribouillage à l'encre noire avec des aplats de couleurs vives et limitées sur un fond crème. Il se distingue par l'utilisation de motifs rayés, de formes géométriques abstraites et d'éléments graphiques ludiques comme des traits d'action.
prompt: A playful, hand-drawn doodle illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a bold ink sketch style with thick, expressive black outlines. The composition uses a strict, limited color palette featuring broad flat fills of {{primary_color}} and small pops of {{accent_color}}, set against a clean, soft cream or off-white background. The aesthetic is characterized by high-contrast graphic elements, including heavy diagonal stripe patterns, geometric shapes, and whimsical floating details like squiggles, dots, and comic-style action lines surrounding the subject. The rendering is flat and vector-like, mimicking a modern corporate creative sketch with a spontaneous, energetic vibe. No shading, high contrast, clean linework, minimalist composition, 2D vector art, ink illustration, creative motif.
background_prompt: A creative pattern of hand-drawn doodle elements and abstract shapes scattered across a neutral background. The scene features bold black and white striped geometric blocks, oversized stylized organic leaves, and playful scribble marks like spirals, asterisks, and motion lines. Scattered handwritten typography fragments and empty speech bubbles add texture to the environment. The design uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and sharp hits of {{accent_color}} to create a vibrant, chaotic yet balanced framing device or wallpaper texture, completely void of any central character.
description_fr: Ce style combine des illustrations de type gribouillage à l'encre noire avec des aplats de couleurs vives et limitées sur un fond crème. Il se distingue par l'utilisation de motifs rayés, de formes géométriques abstraites et d'éléments graphiques ludiques comme des traits d'action.

title: Modern Vector
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle plate aux couleurs vives et aux formes géométriques épurées. Il privilégie les aplats de couleurs saturées, l'absence de contours et un ombrage minimaliste pour une esthétique moderne et professionnelle.
prompt: A high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a trendy modern corporate art style reminiscent of tech startup branding. The visual aesthetic is defined by bold geometric shapes, exaggerated yet pleasing proportions, and razor-sharp edges with absolutely no outlines. The lighting is uniform and flat, utilizing only hard-edged, solid-colored shadows to create depth without gradients or texture noise. The color palette is vivid and highly saturated, featuring a dominant {{primary_color}} tone that contrasts cleanly with the subject, while distinct {{accent_color}} elements provide visual pop and energy. The composition is clean and centered, conveying a mood of approachability and professionalism. The rendering is perfectly smooth, digital, and crisp.

title: Minimalist Contour
description: Ce style présente un art linéaire continu sophistiqué avec des contours noirs fluides et de subtiles touches d'aquarelle. Il utilise l'espace négatif et des effets de papier texturé pour une esthétique moderne, élégante et minimaliste.
prompt: A sophisticated minimalist illustration of {{subject}} executed in a masterfully fluid continuous line art style. The artwork features organic, unbroken black ink contours that define the form with elegance and simplicity, utilizing ample negative space to suggest volume without shading. The line weight is consistent, resembling a fine-tip archival marker or fountain pen gliding across the surface. Soft, translucent watercolor washes in {{accent_color}} provide a delicate splash of color, loosely following the contours or highlighting focal points without filling the shapes completely, adding a dreamlike, hand-painted quality. The underlying texture mimics high-quality cold-press watercolor paper with visible grain and organic irregularities. The composition is centered and balanced, emphasizing the purity of the line work and the abstraction of the {{subject}}. The color palette is primarily monochromatic ink against the paper, with {{primary_color}} used for any additional defining lines. The lighting is flat and uniform, typical of vector illustration or scanned ink drawings, ensuring high contrast between the dark lines and the surface. The overall aesthetic is modern, chic, and understated. The image is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface to facilitate easy background removal while maintaining the paper texture edges. No complex shading, no photorealism, purely graphic and artistic.
background_prompt: A macro close-up of high-quality textured art paper in a shade of {{background_color}}. The surface exhibits a subtle, organic grain similar to cold-press watercolor paper or heavy cardstock. Faint, abstract watercolor washes or ink splatters in {{accent_color}} and {{primary_color}} frame the edges gently, leaving the center open and clean. The lighting is soft and even, highlighting the tactile quality of the paper fiber without creating harsh shadows. Minimalist, artistic stationery background.
description_en: This style features sophisticated continuous line art with fluid black contours and subtle watercolor accents. It utilizes negative space and textured paper effects for a modern, elegant, and minimalist aesthetic.
description_fr: Ce style présente un art linéaire continu sophistiqué avec des contours noirs fluides et de subtiles touches d'aquarelle. Il utilise l'espace négatif et des effets de papier texturé pour une esthétique moderne, élégante et minimaliste.

title: Soft Clay
description: Un style de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisé par des textures lisses et mates rappelant le plastique doux ou l'argile raffinée. Il utilise des palettes pastel, un éclairage de studio diffus et une géométrie arrondie pour créer une esthétique propre, tactile et réconfortante.
prompt: A high-fidelity 3D rendering of {{subject}} executed in a charming, minimalistic claymorphism style. The subject is modeled with smooth, rounded edges and a pristine matte finish that mimics soft-touch plastic, hardened fondant, or refined clay. The surface texture is uniform and velvety, absorbing light gently without harsh specular highlights. The color scheme features {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the main structure, accented by {{accent_color}} for smaller details or text elements to create a pleasing visual balance. The lighting is composed of a soft, diffuse studio setup with large area lights, generating gentle, wrap-around illumination and soft, feathered shadows that ground the object. The scene is set against a clean, seamless {{background_color}} background, ensuring a smooth transition between the subject and the environment. The rendering style emulates high-end motion graphics software like Cinema 4D with Octane Render or Blender Cycles, prioritizing a clean, toy-like aesthetic with physically based rendering (PBR) materials that feel synthetic yet incredibly tactile and satisfying. The composition is uncluttered, focusing entirely on the purity of form and color interaction.
background_prompt: A minimal, seamless 3D studio environment featuring a smooth infinite backdrop in {{background_color}}. The space is illuminated by soft, diffuse global illumination that creates gentle gradients across the curved surface. Subtle, abstract geometric primitives (spheres, cubes, or cylinders) in soft shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} are placed in the periphery or blurred in the distance to add depth without distracting from the center. The floor has a matte texture that catches soft, directional shadows.
description_en: A minimal 3D rendering style featuring smooth, matte textures reminiscent of soft plastic or refined clay. It utilizes pastel color palettes, diffuse studio lighting, and rounded geometry to create a clean, tactile, and comforting aesthetic.
description_fr: Un style de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisé par des textures lisses et mates rappelant le plastique doux ou l'argile raffinée. Il utilise des palettes pastel, un éclairage de studio diffus et une géométrie arrondie pour créer une esthétique propre, tactile et réconfortante.

title: Corporate Sketch
description: Ce style se caractérise par une illustration vectorielle minimaliste aux contours noirs façon croquis et aux aplats de couleurs unies sans ombrage. L'esthétique est épurée et professionnelle, utilisant largement l'espace négatif blanc pour une clarté maximale.
prompt: A professional minimalist vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a clean corporate art style. The rendering relies on distinct, hand-drawn black ink outlines that are slightly sketchy yet confident, clearly defining forms without rigid geometry. Coloration consists strictly of flat, solid blocks of {{primary_color}} for main elements and {{accent_color}} for highlights, with absolutely no gradients, shadows, or texturing. Large areas of white negative space are integrated into the figures. The composition is isolated against a pure white background, emphasizing simplicity and communication. 2D, flat design, vector graphics, white background, no shading, minimal, corporate art, high contrast, clean lines, editorial illustration.
background_prompt: A minimal, abstract background setting featuring sparse architectural lines and simple geometric forms drawn in a sketchy black outline style. The environment uses flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to suggest spatial structure without visual clutter. The design relies heavily on white negative space and complete 2D flatness, creating a clean, professional atmosphere suitable for corporate presentations or editorial layouts.

title: Risograph Spotlight
description: Ce style unique combine l'illustration vectorielle plate avec une texture granuleuse et bruyante rappelant l'impression risographique ou le dessin à la craie. Il se distingue par un éclairage dramatique en forme de cône (spotlight) qui crée un contraste géométrique net entre les zones éclairées et les ombres.
prompt: A flat editorial illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a textured risograph art style. The scene is defined by a dramatic, hard-edged cone of light that cuts through the composition, brightly illuminating the {{subject}} while casting the surrounding areas into deep, flat shadows. The visual texture is heavy and tactile, featuring a grainy, speckled noise overlay that mimics chalk, pastel, or coarse paper printing. The color palette is limited and retro-modern, dominated by shades of {{primary_color}} with striking details in {{accent_color}}. The rendering avoids realistic 3D depth, opting for stylized 2D shapes with slightly imperfect, organic edges. The atmosphere is cozy, whimsical, and creative, reminiscent of high-end tech blog illustrations or indie magazine art, grainy texture, risograph print, hard shadows, flat design, editorial illustration, noise overlay, retro palette, 2D vector art, textured paper, high contrast lighting.

title: Spotlight Lineart
prompt: A precise isometric line art illustration of {{subject}}, rendered with fine, consistent ink outlines in {{primary_color}}. The drawing style is technical yet whimsical, set upon a textured, off-white paper surface with visible grain and speckles. A dramatic, semi-transparent conical spotlight beam in {{accent_color}} shines down from above, illuminating a specific circular section of the {{subject}}. Inside this pool of light, the details are filled with solid flat {{accent_color}} tones, creating a focal point, while elements outside the beam remain as clean, unfilled skeletal outlines. The composition is minimalist with ample negative space, composited on a clean {{background_color}} background to ensure sharp edge definition.
background_prompt: A textured vintage paper surface featuring a geometric conical spotlight beam descending from the top center in {{accent_color}}. The beam casts a defined circular pool of flat color on the ground plane, meant to highlight a central element. The surrounding area is composed of negative space with subtle paper grain, faint speckles, and minimal {{primary_color}} texture marks, all set against a {{background_color}} backdrop.

title: Shadow Studio
description: Ce style capture l'essence de la photographie de produit minimaliste avec un éclairage solaire dur et direct qui crée des ombres géométriques tranchées. L'atmosphère est propre, moderne et réaliste, mettant en valeur le sujet par un jeu de contrastes forts entre la lumière vive et les zones d'ombre profondes.
prompt: A professional, high-angle studio product photograph of {{subject}}, showcasing a clean and modern minimalist aesthetic. The scene is illuminated by harsh, direct natural sunlight, casting sharp, diagonal geometric shadows across the {{subject}} and the surrounding surface, mimicking light filtering through a window frame or blinds. The composition is uncluttered, focusing entirely on the texture and form of the object. The color grading is bright and airy, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the subject's highlights, while {{accent_color}} provides subtle contrast in the details or branding elements. The surface texture is smooth, matte, and pristine. The lighting creates a high-contrast look with deep, defined blacks and blown-out whites in the sun-drenched areas, evoking a warm, lazy afternoon atmosphere suitable for high-end mockups, photorealistic, hard lighting, shadow play, 8k, ultra detailed, depth of field, ray tracing, sharp focus, commercial photography.
background_prompt: A pristine, minimalist surface composed of smooth, matte white or light grey material, bathed in bright, hard natural sunlight. Sharp, distinct diagonal shadows cut across the scene, creating a strong geometric pattern of light and dark, suggestive of a window frame or architectural element out of view. The atmosphere is clean and airy, with subtle ambient reflections of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} bouncing off the neutral ground. The texture is uniform and high-quality, designed to create a sense of depth through the interplay of harsh light and deep shadow without any central subject.
